entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Removing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler #71024
    17.9
  • Add some tests covering removing metadata references with MSBuildWorkspace.TryApplyChanges #71023
  • Add tests for MSBuildWorkspace on Windows containing options with quotes in them #71021
  • Switch the BuildHost to use System.Text.Json #71020
  • Correctly respect DOTNET_HOST_PATH in MSBuildWorkspace #71019
  • RemoteControlClient doesn't support BehaviorOnStale.ReturnStale on NetCore. #71014
  • IDE0028 and IDE0300 suggest using collection expressions inside expression trees #71012
  • CS8166 when returning a primary constructor parameter by ref #71011
  • SourceTextComparer has odd IEqualityComparer semantics #71006
  • Unable to use `nameof` in property: attribute in a record's primary constructor #71005
    17.9

Closed

  • false positive for CS8604 when using primary constructor and passing param `ILogger<>` to base ctor #70932
  • Type inference fails for lambda expression returning collection expression #69488
    17.9
  • Failing to build a C# class library project. Unhandled Exception: System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null #70948
    17.9
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797, crash in BindImplicitConstructorInitializer #70909
    17.9
  • C# code with lambda in an array causes severl errors in refactoring code provider + diag analysis #71002
    17.9
  • StackOverflow when building a core-assembly. #60961
    17.9
  • Slice pattern with type pattern generates redundant type test (or fails to perform the test intended) #69053
    17.9
  • Feature flag to debug analyzer exceptions #70660
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify code and services for go-to-def, peek and ctrl-click across C#/VB/TS/F# #71018
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reset loop head state when local function starting state changes #71009
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix building executables for language server #71007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Make sure completion don't trigger source generator #70985
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add GetSemanticModel method with disableNullableAnalysis flag #70912
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: additional tests for output type inference #71017
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71004
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Mitigate RemoteControlClient not properly caching values on netcore. #71016
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix doc comment of a SyntaxToken #71015
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Skip flaky test SearchGraphQueryTests_NavigateTo.SearchForMember #70995
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle hoisted exception temps during closure rewriting #70997
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid invalid cast exception in BindImplicitConstructorInitializer for top level statements with non-object base type. #71000
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged, Next
  • Do not return FunctionTypeSymbol from InferBestType helper. #71008
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Mark two more error codes as build-only #70999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add ExternalAccess.EditorConfigGenerator to visx manifest #71003
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use new lazily initialized value type in projectinfo #70993
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost #71025
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • added preproc for Core specific RCC download paths #70974
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
